# <code>schema</code> for database

<div class='command-title'>Show sqlite database information, including its schema.</div>

## Signature

```> schema```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Show the schema of a SQLite database
```shell
  > open foo.db | schema
```
